div.t-if: not no_breadcrumbs and not my_details and not breadcrumbs_searchbar

div.class: row align-items-center bg-white no-gutters border rounded

option.t-att-selected: perp.id == perp.id if complaint['perpertrators'] != None and perp in complaint['perpertrators'] else perp.id == None
perp.id == perp.id if complaint['perpertrators'] != None and perp in complaint['perpertrators'] else perp.id == None

div.p: Use the top button '+ New' to create an event.

header.t-attf-class: overflow-hidden bg-secondary #{opt_events_list_columns and 'col-12 rounded-top' or 'col-sm-4 col-lg-3 rounded-left'} #{(not opt_events_list_cards) and 'rounded shadow'} #{(not opt_events_list_cards and not opt_events_list_columns) and 'rounded-top'}

h5.t-attf-class: card-title mt-2 mb-0 text-truncate #{(not event.website_published) and 'text-danger'}

footer.t-attf-class: small #{opt_events_list_cards and 'card-footer' or ((not opt_events_list_columns) and 'border-top mx-4 mt-auto pt-2' or 'border-top py-2')}

div.p: How did you find out about As?
How often do you use or access the system?
Please rate your level of satisfaction with the project
Do you have any suggestions to improve this activity?

form.class: custom-form consulting-form bg-white shadow-lg mb-5 mb-lg-0

div.h5:
Thank you for your time. We have received your feedback.
back
